alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 8:12PM CDT until March 30 at 9:26AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Gasconade River near Rich Fountain. Meramec River at Fenton. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Kaskaskia River at Carlyle. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri... Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. Meramec River near Arnold. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, The Route 66 State Park road to the equestrian trailhead and to the boat ramp is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 26.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Monday was 27.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue falling to 6.7 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Meramec River Eureka 19.0 26.6 17.4 10.3 8.6 7.5 6.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
